title: Items Sets
body: Why was the item sets feature removed. It was so good not having to browse and look for items.(atleast i can't find it in the new client)

replies.body:
It wasn't technically removed, it just wasn't written into the new client. Your item sets still exist, and you can edit/create them in the legacy client and use them in-game while using the new client, you simply have to launch into a game to view them while inside the legacy client before they show up in the Beta Client. It's unknown at this time whether Item Set creation/editing will be in the new client later down the road or not.

Let me know if you have any questions.
